dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: I'm good, thank you. How about you?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I'm doing well too. Any plans for the day?

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: Not really, just going to relax and enjoy the day. How about you?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I have some errands to run, but after that, I'll also take some time to relax.
